name: Avoid Processes using JDBC SQL Direct  (TIBCO BW)
description:
This rule searches for ProcessActivities of type JDBCGeneralActivity.
ProcessActivity is a property captured in the metamodel.
output:
This report lists all  Processes having a JDBCGeneraleActivity.
It provides the following information:
Process Activity full name.
rationale:
The SQL Direct allows to execute custom SQL commands.
However it can lead to inconsistency because of underlying different SQL dialects.
reference: 3.2.3 REL-003: Uses of JDBC SQL Direct
remediation: Use another built-in dedicated activity to the target RDBMS.
